title: Probing electrochemical strain generation in sodium chromium oxide (NaCrO2) cathode in Na-ion batteries during charge/discharge
content:
Energy Adv., 2024, 3,601-608
DOI: 10.1039/D3YA00563A, Paper

Minal Wable, Batuhan Bal, Ömer Özgür Capraz
Operando electrochemical strain generations in NaCrO2 cathode electrode during cycling are monitored using a digital image correlation.
